dc.title: Quality Interagency Coordination (QuIC) Task Force [Archived Site]
dc.description: The Quality Interagency Coordination Task Force (QuIC) ensures that Federal agencies that purchase, provide, study, or regulate health care services work in a coordinated way toward the common goal of improving the quality of care.
